channel.title: Cya Guys
channel.description:
I'm leaving Mopar server and the forums. I made a pledge to myself that I would leave this part of my life behind awhile ago and I started playing again, I forgot that it was ruining my life. I want to say goodbye, I've enjoyed helping people with their forum and helping their server get going. I started Mopar in 06 and ran a server for 2 years, I recently tried to start Cubanscape up back again but somewhere along the line I had no interest anymore. This is it guys, good luck with your servers/forums.
-Cuban0 ftw
Thanks JC for being a good friend and helping me with my server and giving my troubleshooting help.
I don't have time to post the whole list of people who helped me, this was just a quick idea of who was my friend.

that’s 2 years.[/quote]
You don’t have to register to go on the forums, he most likely didn’t register right away. Actually, a year later, after being on the forums i registered -.-… Anyways, bye goodluck in life.

Read full topic

item.title: Cya Guys
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

ziplock:

They need to make a rule against these topics… No one really cares, and it’s spamming the section up.

If you don’t really care then don’t read it, he’s just trying to make a point that these forums and servers are messing us all up, we all spend allot of time playing/hosting servers and making models and stuff. when we don’t realise that we’re decreasing our eye vision and stuff, you might not notice that ur forcing your eyes to see what ur computer shows but they’re actually forcing. which will cause you to get glasses, not permanent but if you keep on and don’t use them it can get worse.

Bye Cuban0 FTW.

Read full topic

Who are you?

No-one cares. If you’re leaving then just PM the people who you want to say goodbye to, rather than posting these pointless topics.
[/quote]

Better yet just put it in your signiture that you are leaving. Anyone who cares will notice.[/quote]

Better idea I suppose.
